message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving of $1,000 compared to its market value. I am confident that you will find this product invaluable and worth every penny. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know.
